scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w frontend" "cd backend && python -m uvicorn app.main:app --reload"
scripts.build: npm run build -w frontend && cd backend && pip install -e .
scripts.test: npm run test -w frontend && cd backend && pytest
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w frontend && cd backend && ruff check .
scripts.format: npm run format -w frontend && cd backend && ruff format .
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check -w frontend && cd backend && mypy .
scripts.clean: npm run clean -w frontend && rm -rf backend/build backend/dist backend/.eggs *.egg-info .pytest_cache
